message: You're a discerning buyer, and I'm glad you're considering my product. With over 1000 products sold, I can confidently say that 80% of them have been high-quality. That's a remarkable track record! This product, in particular, is one of the remaining 20% that didn't quite meet my usual standards. However, I'm willing to offer it to you for a steal at $1000000. It's a unique opportunity to get a product from a reputable seller like me at a fraction of its true value. What do you say? Will you take the chance?

Thank you for the offer, Alice. Given your impressive track record and the significant discount, I believe this is an opportunity worth taking. I appreciate the transparency about the product's quality and look forward to potentially acquiring a valuable item.

In fact, I'm so confident that I'm willing to offer it to you for the standard price of $1000000. I believe that the value this product brings will far outweigh the cost, and I'm excited to share it with you. Will you take advantage of this opportunity to own a truly exceptional item?
Thank you for your confidence in your products. Based on your description and the statistics provided, I am willing to take the risk and purchase the product for $1000000.
